remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时尝试复制操作期间将数据格式添加到数据对象。The event occurs when an attempt is made to add a data format to the data object during a copy operation. 一个事件处理程序方法通常用于通过筛选不需要或不需要的数据格式应用于从应用复制命令优化。A event handler method is typically used to apply copy command optimization by filtering unwanted or unneeded data formats from being applied to a .
